analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/17/0x574a4292c9d910b0b280f542f1f88c5389df56cf.sol:
	Contract motherDNAshare has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/17/0x574a4292c9d910b0b280f542f1f88c5389df56cf.sol#216)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/17/0x574a4292c9d910b0b280f542f1f88c5389df56cf.sol#86) is not in mixedCase
